content: from Sela, by way of the desert,
so are the daughters of Moab
When Moab presents himself, when he wearies himself upon the high place, when he comes to his sanctuary to pray, he will not prevail.
This was the word that the  spoke concerning Moab in the past.

But now the  says, In three years, like the years of a hired worker, the glory of Moab will be brought into contempt, in spite of all its great multitude; and those who survive will be very few and feeble.
